entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain in the morning then to periods of rain in the afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
